empty.title: No employees in the organisation
empty.description: Employees are people working in your organisation. You can assign them to positions and manage their schedules.

empty.title: No absences recorded for employees
empty.description: Absences are periods when employees are not available to work. You can track and manage these absences here.

empty.title: No positions in the organisation
empty.description: Positions are roles within your organisation. You can assign employees to positions and manage their schedules.
